remarks: A variation on ~ strfv to avoid asserting that ` S ` itself is a function, which involves sethood of all the ordered pair components of ` S ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
strfv2.s $e |- S e. _V $.
strfv2.f $e |- Fun `' `' S $.
strfv2.e $e |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) $.
strfv2.n $e |- <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S $.
strfv2 $p |- ( C e. V -> C = ( E ` S ) ) $.
